challenges.formInTargetLanguage: Kao što bi čuo, oni bi bili tihi.
challenges.meaningInSourceLanguage: If you would hear, they would be silent.

challenges.meaning: If you would hear, they would be silent.

challenges.formattedSolution: Kao što bi čuo, oni bi bili tihi.
If you would hear, they would be silent.

challenges.formInTargetLanguage: Kad ne bi bio glup, ne bi činio gluposti.
challenges.meaningInSourceLanguage: If you were not stupid, you would not do foolish things.

challenges.meaning: If you were not stupid, you would not do foolish things.

challenges.formattedSolution: Kad ne bi bio glup, ne bi činio gluposti.
If you were not stupid, you would not do foolish things.

challenges.formInTargetLanguage: Kad ne bi bili lijeni, pomogli bismo im.

challenges.formInTargetLanguage: Djeca su mudra za svoju dob.
